abstract.t: In accordance with rapid increase of data related to IoT and big data, techniques to control high capacity data is currently active and vibrant research field. Enterprises are trying to manage data on the cloud because of flexibility and capability. However, there are some limits to handle data intelligently in cloud. The SDS is considered as a good technique regarding this manner. SDS improves efficiency, scalability and flexibility in scale-out architecture, as well as, provides a cost effective solution using the existing storage resources efficiently.
